TableUtils package¶

Submodules¶

TableUtils.TableTools module¶

class TableUtils.TableTools.TableTool(file_path=None, map_file=None, outfile_type='.csv', loc_col='Location', ctry_col='Country', reg_col='Region', lat_col='Latitude', lng_col='Longitude')¶

Bases: object

add_entry(loc, ctry, reg, lat, lng)¶

Adds a new row to the data frame and overwrites the input file if successfully added.

Parameters:
  • loc –
  • ctry –
  • reg –
  • lat –
  • lng –
Returns:

a tuple containing the type of entry and the information of the row represented in a dictionary.
cell_in_table(value, col_list)¶

Checks to see whether a cell with a certain value exists in the column.

Parameters:
  • value – the condition being checked for.
  • col_list – all of the entries in the column in a list.
Returns:

a list of indices of rows with the value.
clean_table()¶

Runs through the entire data frame and verifies all of the entries, exports 3 output files: verified entries, pending entries, and repeated entries.

Returns:the percentage of entries that could not be validated/geocoded.
export_file(df, outfile, directory)¶

Exports the input data frame to the designated directory and outfile type.

Parameters:
  • df – the data frame
  • outfile – name of the output file
  • directory – name of the directory
Returns:
query_table(loc=None, ctry=None, lat=None, lng=None)¶

Queries the table for entries that match the conditions. Conditions must be:

  • Location, country, latitude, longitude
  • Location or country
  • Location and country
  • Latitude and longitude
Parameters:
  • loc –
  • ctry –
  • lat –
  • lng –
Returns:

the indices of the entries matching the query.
read_file(file_path)¶

Reads in csv or excel file. Raises an error if a different file type was entered.

Parameters:file_path – .csv or .xlsx
Returns:a pandas data frame.
verify_by_indices(indices)¶

Verifies certain rows in the data frame given the indices and exports the results to a separate file.

Parameters:indices – all of the indices being checked for in a list.
Returns:
verify_by_value(loc=None, ctry=None, lat=None, lng=None)¶

Verifies certain rows in the data frame using location, country, latitude, or longitude conditions, exports the results to a separate file.

Parameters:
  • loc –
  • ctry –
  • lat –
  • lng –
Returns:
verify_row(index)¶

Verifies a single row in the data frame.

Parameters:index – index of the row.
Returns:a tuple containing the type of entry and the information of the row represented in a dictionary.
